Functions
PrintC
static void PrintC(
const char *msg,
...
)

Prints unformatted text to the console.

Parameters
msg
const char*

The message to print to the console.

Example
PrintC("Plugin loading complete");

...
)

Parameters

Example
PrintC("Plugin loading complete");
PrintC
static void PrintC(
const char *msg,
Color &c
)

Prints colored text to the console.

Parameters
msg
const char*

The message to print to the console.

c
Color&

The color to use for the message.

Example
PrintC("Plugin loading complete", COLOR_RED);
PrintC("Custom colors are supported", Color(255, 150, 0, 255));
See Also

formstring
template<typename T, typename... Others> static std::string formstring(
T t,
Others... others
)

Combines multiple values into a single string.

Parameters
t
T

The first string on which to add other strings.

others
Others...

A set of strings to add to the first.

Example
PrintC(formstring("Player ", player_name, " has joined team ", team_number));
RunCommand
static void RunCommand(
lua_State *state,
const char *cmd
)

Executes a console command.

Parameters
state
lua_State*

The lua state to use for execution.

cmd
const char*

The string to use as the command.

Example
RunCommand(LUA, "npc_create npc_citizen");
RunLua
static void RunLua(
lua_State *state,
const char *lua
)

Compiles a string into lua bytecode, then executes it.

Parameters
state
lua_State*

The lua state to use for execution.

lua
const char*

The string to be executed.

Example
RunLua(LUA, "Msg('sending a message from lua')");
Hook
static void Hook(
lua_State *state,
const char *hook,
const char *name,
GarrysMod::Lua::CFunc &func
)

Hooks a CFunc into a game event.

Parameters
state
lua_State*

The lua state to use for execution.

hook
const char*

The name of the hook to hook into.

name
const char*

The name of the custom handler we are creating.

func
GarrysMod::Lua::CFunc&

The function to call when the hook is called.

Example
Hook(LUA, "PlayerSpawn", "awesome_spawnhandler", PlayerSpawnHandler);
RegisterFunction
static void RegisterFunction(
lua_State *state,
const char *name,
GarrysMod::Lua::CFunc &func
)

Registers a c++ function to make it accessible from within Garrys Mod lua.

Parameters
state
lua_State*

The lua state to use for execution.

name
const char*

The name to use for the function within lua.

func
GarrysMod::Lua::CFunc&

The function to be used when the call is made from within lua.

Example
RegisterFunction(LUA, "KillAllPlayers", KillAllPlayers);
Broadcast
static void Broadcast(
lua_State *state,
const char *msg
)

Broadcasts a message to all players on the server. Will show up in chat, and in the console.

Parameters
state
lua_State*

The lua state to use for execution.

msg
const char*

The message to broadcast.

Example
Broadcast(LUA, "A new event will begin in 30 seconds.");
